entry.title: Proposal: SPV Fee Discovery mechanism
entry.summary: The context is a discussion about the predictability of dropped transactions. One person argues that transactions are dropped in a completely predictable way - lowest fee/KB first. Another person acknowledges this, but points out that from the user's perspective, the dropping of transactions can still be unpredictable if they don't know how to pick the appropriate fees. The discussion revolves around the importance of predictability for users when it comes to transaction fees and dropped transactions.
